parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Visual Studio Team Services account.

tags.name: Plans
tags.description: Controller for the Scaled Agile plans REST API

get.description: Get available board columns in a project
Get available board rows in a project

post.description: Add a new plan for the team

get.description: Get the information for all the plans configured for the given team
Get the information for the specified plan

put.description: Update the information for the specified plan

get.description: Get Delivery View Data

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: Revision of the plan for which you want data. If the current plan is a different revision you will get an ViewRevisionMismatchException exception. If you do not supply a revision you will get data for the latest revision.

get.description: Get process configuration
Gets backlog configuration for a team
Get boards
Get board user settings for a board id

patch.description:
Update board user settings for the board id

We don't want stakeholders to update board settings (currently just autorefresh). The BacklogManagement feature check validates this.

get.description: Get board card Rule settings for the board id or board by name

patch.description: Update board card Rule settings for the board id or board by name

get.description: Get board card settings for the board id or board by name

put.description: Update board card settings for the board id or board by name

get.description: Get board charts

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Identifier for board, either board's backlog level name (Eg:"Stories") or Id

get.description: Get a board chart

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Identifier for board, either board's backlog level name (Eg:"Stories") or Id

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Identifier for board, either board's backlog level name (Eg:"Stories") or Id

get.description: Get columns on a board

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Name or ID of the specific board

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of board columns to update

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Name or ID of the specific board

get.description: Get rows on a board

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Name or ID of the specific board

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of board rows to update

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: Name or ID of the specific board

get.description: Get board

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: identifier for board, either board's backlog level name (Eg:"Stories") or Id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: identifier for board, either category plural name (Eg:"Stories") or guid

get.description: Returns the list of parent field filter model for the given list of workitem ids
Get a team's settings
Get a team's iterations using timeframe filter

parameters.name: $timeframe
parameters.description: A filter for which iterations are returned based on relative time

post.description: Add an iteration to the team

delete.description: Delete a team's iteration by iterationId

get.description: Get team's iteration by iterationId
Get a team's capacity
Get a team member's capacity
Get team's days off for an iteration

patch.description: Set a team's days off for an iteration

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Team's days off patch containting a list of start and end dates

get.description: Get a collection of team field values

workItemTypeMappedStates.description: Mapped states for work item types

typeFields.description: Field Type (e.g. Order, Activity) to Field Reference Name map

categoryReferenceName.description: Reference name of the corresponding WIT category

pluralName.description: Plural name for the backlog level

workItemStates.description: Collection of work item states that are included in the plan. The server will filter to only these work item types.

workItemTypes.description: Collection of valid workitem type names for the given backlog level

addPanelFields.description: List of fields to include in Add Panel

columnFields.description: Default list of columns for the backlog

defaultWorkItemType.description: Defaulst Work Item Type for the backlog

id.description: Backlog Id (for Legacy Backlog Level from process config it can be categoryref name)

workItemCountLimit.description: Max number of work items to show in the given backlog

workItemTypes.description: Work Item types participating in this backlog as known by the project/Process, can be overridden by team settings for bugs

url.description: Full http link to the resource
Full http link to the resource

CardFieldSettings.description: Card settings, such as fields and rules

additionalFields.description: A collection of field information of additional fields on cards. The index in the collection signifies the order of the field among the additional fields. Currently unused. Should be used with User Story 691539: Card setting: additional fields

assignedToDisplayFormat.description: Display format for the assigned to field

coreFields.description: A collection of field information of rendered core fields on cards.

showAssignedTo.description: Flag indicating whether to show assigned to field on cards. When true, AssignedToDisplayFormat will determine how the field will be displayed

showEmptyFields.description: Flag indicating whether to show empty fields on cards

showId.description: Flag indicating whether to show ID on cards

showState.description: Flag indicating whether to show state field on cards

showTags.description: Flag indicating whether to show tags on cards

CardSettings.description: Card settings, such as fields and rules

fields.description: A collection of settings related to rendering of fields on cards

CategoryConfiguration.description: Details about a given backlog category

workItemTypes.description: Work item types for the backlog category

name.description: Name of the plan to create.

DeliveryViewData.description: Data contract for Data of Delivery View

childIdToParentIdMap.description: Work item child id to parenet id map

criteriaStatus.description: Filter criteria status of the timeline

endDate.description: The end date of the delivery view data

startDate.description: The start date for the delivery view data

DeliveryViewPropertyCollection.description: Collection of properties, specific to the DeliveryTimelineView

markers.description: Markers. Will be missing/null if there are no markers.

FieldInfo.description: Object bag storing the set of permissions relevant to this plan

isIdentity.description: Indicates if the field definition is for an identity field.

FieldReference.description: An abstracted reference to a field

url.description: Full http link to more information about the field

Marker.description: Client serialization contract for Delivery Timeline Markers.

date.description: Where the marker should be displayed on the timeline.

Plan.description: Data contract for the plan definition

createdByIdentity.description: Identity that created this plan. Defaults to null for records before upgrading to ScaledAgileViewComponent4.

createdDate.description: Date when the plan was created

modifiedByIdentity.description: Identity that last modified this plan. Defaults to null for records before upgrading to ScaledAgileViewComponent4.

modifiedDate.description: Date when the plan was last modified. Default to CreatedDate when the plan is first created.

properties.description: The PlanPropertyCollection instance associated with the plan. These are dependent on the type of the plan. For example, DeliveryTimelineView, it would be of type DeliveryViewPropertyCollection.

revision.description: Revision of the plan. Used to safeguard users from overwriting each other's changes.

url.description: The resource url to locate the plan via rest api

userPermissions.description: Bit flag indicating set of permissions a user has to the plan.

PlanMetadata.description: Metadata about a plan definition that is stored in favorites service

createdByIdentity.description: Identity of the creator of the plan

modifiedDate.description: Last modified date of the plan

userPermissions.description: Bit flag indicating set of permissions a user has to the plan.

PlanPropertyCollection.description: Base class for properties of a scaled agile plan

PlanViewData.description: Base class for plan view data contracts. Anything common goes here.

typeFields.description: Type fields for the process configuration

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

TeamBacklogMapping.description: Mapping of teams to the corresponding work item category

TeamContext.description: The Team Context for an operation.

project.description: The team project Id or name.  Ignored if ProjectId is set.

projectId.description: The Team Project ID.  Required if Project is not set.

team.description: The Team Id or name.  Ignored if TeamId is set.

TeamFieldValues.description: Essentially a collection of team field values

field.description: Shallow ref to the field being used as a team field

values.description: Collection of all valid team field values

TeamMemberCapacity.description: Represents capacity for a specific team member

activities.description: Collection of capacities associated with the team member

daysOff.description: The days off associated with the team member

teamMember.description: Shallow Ref to the associated team member

backlogVisibilities.description: Information about categories that are visible on the backlog.

defaultIteration.description: Default Iteration, the iteration used when creating a new work item on the queries page.

workingDays.description: Days that the team is working

TeamSettingsDataContractBase.description: Base class for TeamSettings data contracts. Anything common goes here.

_links.description: Collection of links relevant to resource

url.description: Full http link to the resource

TeamSettingsIteration.description: Represents a shallow ref for a single iteration

attributes.description: Attributes such as start and end date

TeamSettingsPatch.description: Data contract for what we expect to receive when PATCH

backlog.description: Backlog matching the mapped backlog associated with this team.

fieldReferenceNames.description: The field reference names of the work item data

isExpanded.description: Was iteration and work item data retrieved for this team. <remarks> Teams with IsExpanded false have not had their iteration, work item, and field related data queried and will never contain this data. If true then these items are queried and, if there are items in the queried range, there will be data. </remarks>

iterations.description: The iteration data, including the work items, in the queried date range.

orderByField.description: The order by field name of this team

partiallyPagedFieldReferenceNames.description: The field reference names of the partially paged work items, such as ID, WorkItemType

projectId.description: The project id the team belongs team

teamFieldName.description: The team field name of this team

workItemTypeColors.description: Colors for the work item types.

finishDate.description: The end date of the iteration

partiallyPagedWorkItems.description: All the partially paged workitems in this iteration.

startDate.description: The start date of the iteration

workItems.description: The work items that have been paged in this iteration

name.description: Name of the plan to create.

revision.description: Revision of the plan that was updated - the value used here should match the one the server gave the client in the Plan.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

WorkItemFieldReference.description: Reference to a field in a work item

referenceName.description: The reference name of the field.

url.description: The REST URL of the resource.

WorkItemTrackingResourceReference.description: Base class for work item tracking resource references.

WorkItemTypeReference.description: Reference to a work item type.

name.description: Name of the work item type.

states.description: State name to state category map

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.1-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.work: Grants the ability to read work items, queries, boards, area and iterations paths, and other work item tracking related metadata. Also grants the ability to execute queries and to receive notifications about work item events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.work_write: Grants the ability to read, create, and update work items and queries, update board metadata, read area and iterations paths other work item tracking related metadata, execute queries, and to receive notifications about work item events via service hooks.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
